definition: to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: It was the site of a British victory over the Saxons in571. Population, 74, 500.
sentences.chinese: 它是571年大不列顛人打敗撒克遜人的遺址。

sentences.english: This reduces your confidence, making you more vulnerable to your fears.
sentences.chinese: 它會腐蝕掉你的自信，使你被恐懼打敗。

sentences.english: After eight years of fighting, the Chinese people at lastdefeated the Japanese invaders.
sentences.chinese: 經過八年浴血奮戰，中國人民終於打敗了日本侵略者。

sentences.english: Yes, only a rat puppet beat them out.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，只有一個老鼠木偶打敗過他們。

sentences.english: What do you think it takes to beat you besides luck?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得要想打敗你，除了運氣還需要點什麼？

sentences.english: Aleppo is very happy now that the terrorists have been defeated, so I gather.
sentences.chinese: 阿勒頗正爲恐怖分子被打敗而高興。

sentences.english: We need more moral cohesion if we're to defeat the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們要想打敗敵人就需要更多的精神上的內聚力。

sentences.english: Hannibal defeated the Romans in 216 BC.
sentences.chinese: 漢尼拔於公元前216年打敗了羅馬軍。

sentences.english: China defeated India in a short war in 1962.
sentences.chinese: 在1962年的短暫戰爭中，中國打敗了印度。

sentences.english: Very few gas-powered passenger cars can beat the Chevy Volt off the line.
sentences.chinese: 燃油動力的乘用車很少能打敗雪佛蘭伏特。

sentences.english: The spring and Autumn period, King Wu defeated and captured goujian.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時期，吳王夫差打敗並俘虜了越王勾踐。

sentences.english: Li Lei beat Jim and won the first place.
sentences.chinese: 李雷打敗了吉姆，獲得了第一名。

sentences.english: She defeated the bad guy by virtue of her courage and by a pair of vices.
sentences.chinese: 由於她的勇氣和藉助一對老虎鉗，她打敗了那個壞蛋。

sentences.english: But peaches can not defeat Tai Long.
Qatar beat Iran78-61 in the round-robin portion of the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 卡塔爾在小組賽曾以78比61打敗伊朗。

sentences.english: The Bears defeated the Tigers during overtime.
sentences.chinese: 熊隊在延長賽裏打敗了虎隊。

definition: to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
to fit one into the other/to bring two things into contact
